DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read unified group memberships as guest
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read basic unified group properties, memberships and owners of the group the signed-in guest is a member of.
DelegatedWork.userDisplayName: Read unified group memberships as guest
DelegatedWork.userDescription: Allows the app to read basic unified group properties, memberships and owners of the group you are a member of.
